attributes.action: Add Bartender and hospitality staff to qualified jobs for a UK visa.
attributes.additional_details: To allow talented hospitality members below management to obtain a visa and to make the visa and sponsorship process easier. For the sake of the hospitality industry, things need to change as we depend heavily on the talent of European bartenders and other bartenders from abroad. We should allow other sponsorship that's not just from a job but a company or family.
attributes.background: We have some of the best bars and restaurants in the world that need the best possible staff. Due to Covid 19 and Brexit it's now incredibly difficult for hospitality staff, unless in general management to obtain a visa  & sponsorship from abroad & our industry relies bartenders from outside the UK.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/584585
